result.title: Report on the demonstration of SteamBio unit in rural locations
result.description: The SteamBio unit will be operated at five different demonstration locations to valorise over six different agro-forestry residues. Its performances and the demonstration activities at each demonstration site will be included in this report.

result.title: Specification of desired capability of separation methods and track quality
result.description: "Indicates the precision required of a separation method for use in standardization, constraints on costs and scope of application (type of products, tracks, environments, etc). result.title: State of the Art of Cost Assessment Methodologies
result.description: It reviews all the literature and substantive findings from previous research projects in Running Gear. Describes current technical as well as business models.
